title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The flashing should be minimized to only the bottom edge of the outermost frames that need to be repainted when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window vertically. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
